name: Project Nano (Jorge Torres)
description:
Play through a number of body parts (rooms), killing viruses and healing your patient to unlock the final room.

Controls: WASD to move, Arrow Keys to shoot.

Note: All rooms need to be cleared before the last room opens. The game is a prototype and WIP.
